name: Star Wars Droid Check
description:
This template uses the Star Wars API to extract droid information, demonstrating how to filter and work with specific items from a larger dataset. Feel free to customize the filters and iterators to explore more species or characteristics as per your requirements.

Beyond Star Wars, this approach is great for practical tasks like sorting customer orders, identifying unpaid invoices, or filtering data by specific attributes.

Data source: [SWAPI](https://swapi.dev/)
